caption: A dwarf and a man are in conversation. The dwarf is dressed in armor, while the man appears to be on the heavier side. They seem to be discussing something serious.On a ship at night, several ships are present, and people are on board. They appear to be launching an attack under the cover of darkness.On a city wall, the dwarf from earlier is involved in deployment activities. A girl approaches him and starts talking, and then another young man comes over to converse with him. Subsequently, the young man ascends the city wall for patrol duty. The night is dark, and visibility is low.
